coded_answer.p: I am writtingwriting to inform you of some problems we had. I wantwent to the theatre to see "over the rainbowOver The Rainbow" aton 17th June.

First of all, we went to the ticket office to get the tickets. I thought we cancould buy discounts tickets according tobecause of the advertisement. However, we couldn't buy them the price. eventuallyEventually, we got the tickets, Becausebecause we would likewantwanted to see the musical and Danny Brook. AfterWhen we arrivearrived at the theatre, Wewe were very disappointed. Because, because thea different actor playedperformed in the musical that day. In addition, Itit started at 20:15. We had to wait over 40 minituesminutes. and we couldn't enjoy dinner at the theatre restaurant after the show.
I think if the musical startstarts late time, you should open the restaurant until late time.
To tell the truth, we couldn't enjoy our evening. Would it be possible for me to back my money for the tickets.?
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
Unfortunately, Pat wasn't very good at keeping secrets.
We had a secret. After we finishfinished school, we usually gathered thein a certain place. Where do you think it was?

It was ship!! There was a beach by our town. One day, Freddie found it there. itIt was old and a little brokendilapidated. But it was the most important place in the world. We always played there and it was an adventure for us.

One day, Suddenlysuddenly, a heavy storm came to our town. I went to the seabeach to seecheck on our ship. My friends had comegone there, too. We worried about it and we tryedtried to pull it. It seemed to sanksink into the sea, but fourtunatelyfortunately, the storm went away soonsoon went away. Our ship leftwas left on the beach. And our parents and teachers were there, too. Because, because Pat calledhad called them. Of course we couldn't play there after that.
But now, I am thinking about new secret our placeour new secret place. Where do you think that is?
